name: The History Channel: Battle of Britain WWII 1940
name_original: The History Channel: Battle of Britain WWII 1940
description:
The History Channel: Battle of Britain WWII 1940 is a simulation-arcade game developed by iEntertainment Network. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Activision Value Publishing.
You can play The History Channel: Battle of Britain WWII 1940 on PC.
